fields.label: Do you have written guidelines that clearly stipulate financial resilience support extended to nonprofit partners?

fields.description: This can be through helping them diversify their funder base, supporting with financial planning, etc.
fields.label: Do you help nonprofit partners build their resilience through non-financial support?

fields.description: This can be through the transfer of surplus that the nonprofit accumulates, dedicated grants and/or the transfer of flexible funding towards reserves building.
fields.label: Do you provide a financial contribution(s) to nonprofit partners to help them build reserves?
How are your guidelines on financial resilience support communicated internally?
How are your guidelines on financial resilience support communicated to nonprofits (current and potential) and the wider sector?
